Package com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.auth

Interface AuthProviderFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
SamlAuthProviderFactory, ShiroAuthProviderFactory
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface AuthProviderFactory
A factory to create an AuthProvider instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AuthProvider create​(AuthProviderParameters parameters)
    Creates a new AuthProvider instance which is used for configuring the authentication layer for the Central Dogma server.

  • Method Details

    • create

      AuthProvider create​(AuthProviderParameters parameters)
      Creates a new AuthProvider instance which is used for configuring the authentication layer for the Central Dogma server.
      Parameters:
      parameters - the parameters which are used to create an AuthProvider instance
